resources.string: Hello, mortal. What wicked plans do you wish to concoct today? Farewell, until your dark desires summon me again. Today's forecast calls for brimstone and fire. Dress accordingly. Why don’t skeletons fight each other? They don’t have the guts. Here’s the latest mischief: Scientists accidentally summon a demon during a quantum physics experiment. speak Welcome to Devilish! I do not understand your command, mortal. Speak clearly or perish!
